column1: #Text=Mako says : " I just want you to know that I 'm going to be watching you , kid .
#Text=I 'm turning over a new leaf , making a change .
#Text=If you need any help with airbending , I could show you what I know .
#Text=" Kai says : " Thanks , that 's real nice of you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Jinora , we 're leaving now .
